Bash("D:\\q4hack\\hackathon_2 by claude\\phase_2\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
from db import engine
from sqlmodel import text
with engine.connect\(\) as conn:
    result = conn.execute\(text\(''SELECT 1''\)\)
    print\(f''DB connection OK: {result.fetchone\(\)}''\)
    # Check if tasks table exists
    result = conn.execute\(text\(""SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=''public''""\)\)
    tables = [r[0] for r in result.fetchall\(\)]
    print\(f''Tables: {tables}''\)
")

Bash("D:\\q4hack\\hackathon_2 by claude\\phase_2\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
from db import engine
from sqlmodel import text
with engine.connect\(\) as conn:
    for table in [''tasks'', ''task'']:
        result = conn.execute\(text\(f""SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name=''{table}'' ORDER BY ordinal_position""\)\)
        cols = result.fetchall\(\)
        print\(f''Table ""{table}"": {[\(c[0], c[1]\) for c in cols]}''\)
    # Also check the user table for Better Auth
    result = conn.execute\(text\(""SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name=''user'' ORDER BY ordinal_position""\)\)
    print\(f''Table ""user"": {[c[0] for c in result.fetchall\(\)]}''\)
")

Bash("D:\\q4hack\\hackathon_2 by claude\\phase_2\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
from db import engine
from sqlmodel import text
with engine.connect\(\) as conn:
    conn.execute\(text\(''ALTER TABLE tasks RENAME COLUMN is_completed TO completed''\)\)
    conn.commit\(\)
    print\(''Renamed is_completed -> completed in tasks table''\)
    # Verify
    result = conn.execute\(text\(""SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name=''tasks'' ORDER BY ordinal_position""\)\)
    print\(f''Tasks columns now: {[c[0] for c in result.fetchall\(\)]}''\)
")

Bash("D:\\q4hack\\hackathon_2 by claude\\phase_2\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
from db import engine
from sqlmodel import text
with engine.connect\(\) as conn:
    conn.execute\(text\(''DROP TABLE IF EXISTS task''\)\)
    conn.execute\(text\(''DROP TABLE IF EXISTS todo''\)\)
    conn.commit\(\)
    print\(''Dropped orphan task/todo tables''\)
    result = conn.execute\(text\(""SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=''public'' ORDER BY table_name""\)\)
    print\(f''Remaining tables: {[r[0] for r in result.fetchall\(\)]}''\)
")
